item.title: Public bet
item.description: Motivation I‚Äôm a very insecure guy. In fact, that was first real feedback that I received from a manager (now a dear friend), ‚ÄúYou‚Äôre exceptionally good in your tasks, but damn, you‚Äôre too insecure about yourself‚Äù, this trait got in my way in a various situations like defending a technical decision to other devs. This was last year, since it a lot of stuff happened: I joined a Bitcoin developer launchpad where I had the opportunity to meet extremely talented people; started to learn Rust and contribute to Open Source; got the second place in a hackathon; did a talk in the greatest cybersecurity event of Latin America; started to do english classes with an amazing teacher, and, started to work at Turso as Open Source contributor in project Limbo.
